title: RLY I PAYED LIKE 200$ FOR THIS GAME AND STILL GETTING TOXIC BANNED?
body:
Okay i got mad because i fed while it was 2-3vs1 on top and my team was blaming me and they did not help at all+they had worst stats then me.... but come on 2 games.... pls riot I spend so much money on this account i wont be toxic anymore just give me 1 more chance :(♥
